# Acquisition of a Particle Size Analyzer
## Description

The National Research Center Canada (NRC) is seeking proposals for the acquisition of a particle size analyzer to characterize dry powder materials in terms of particle size and distribution. The acquired instrument will complement the existing research program at the Construction Research Center (CRC) that supports the Sustainable and Resilient Infrastructure and Communities program, as well as other research initiatives.

### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference**: cb-794-65193229
* **Tender Amendment**: Amendment 10
* **Publication Date**: October 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 30, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 10, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024

### Tender Description

The proposed particle size analyzer must be capable of characterizing dry powder materials and should have the following features:

* High accuracy in measuring particle size distribution
* Ability to analyze various types of powder materials
* User-friendly interface and minimal maintenance requirements
* Compatibility with existing laboratory equipment

### Submission and Evaluation Criteria

* The tender will be evaluated on the basis of technical specifications, experience of the proposer, and ability to supply high-quality particle size analyzers
* The proposer is required to attach an executed copy of the Standard Provisions and Conditions for the Acquisition of Goods and Services (ARP accession 2015-01)
* Proposals must be submitted in electronic format only to [c.curtney@robot.house](mailto:c.curtney@robot.house)

## Important Information

* This is a Request for Proposal (RFP)
* The tender process is open to all interested parties without restrictions however trade agreements and restricted procurement might apply
* Procurement category is Goods and Services.
* The tender notice, tender set, and clarifications can be found on [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21552/23-58122_rfp_acquisitionparticlesizeanalyzer.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21552/23-58122_rfp_acquisitionparticlesizeanalyzer.pdf)
